attributes.action: Lower school meals in all schools
attributes.additional_details: It’s really annoying because everyone is hungry and I can see people taking small bites of their food so they can try be full
attributes.background: Lower all schools meals because even with free school meal you can barely get anything also in a school near me it’s £1.75 for a slice of pizza and 30p for ketchup or mayo or barbecue sauce

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about the cost of school meals, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

The prices of school food are set by individual schools, not the Government or Parliament, but we can accept petitions calling on the Government to increase funding for school meals, to help reduce the cost of these.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Increase free school meal budget for all schools: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643288

If you want to start a new petition you'd need to provide your full name.
